title: Elden Ring
description: An outstanding action RPG with a vast open world and deep lore. FromSoftware delivers another masterpiece.

title: Hogwarts Legacy
description: A dream come true for Harry Potter fans. Magical combat and exploration make it immersive, despite some bugs.

title: God of War: Ragnarok
description: Kratos returns in an epic Norse saga with emotional storytelling and satisfying combat.

title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: After many patches, Night City feels alive. A solid story with lots of player freedom.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom
description: Another groundbreaking open-world game by Nintendo. Puzzles, exploration, and innovation shine throughout.

title: Alan Wake 2
description: A creepy, atmospheric sequel blending psychological horror with engaging narrative design.

title: Tekken 8
description: The latest entry in the iconic fighting game series. Fast-paced, balanced, and visually stunning.
